definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
ginkgo (tree with fan-shaped leaves and yellow seeds)/maidenhair tree
lit. the red apricot tree leans over the garden wall (idiom)/fig. a wife having an illicit lover
village of blossoming apricot trees where one can find a wineshop (reference to the famous poem 清明 by 杜牧[Du4 Mu4])
Xinghualing district of Taiyuan city 太原市[Tai4 yuan2 shi4], Shanxi
Xinghualing district of Taiyuan city 太原市[Tai4 yuan2 shi4], Shanxi
Xinglin district of Xiamen city 廈門市|厦门市 (renamed Haicang district 海滄區|海沧区 in 2003)

forest of apricot trees/fig. honorific term for fine doctor (cf Dr Dong Feng 董奉, 3rd century AD, asked his patients to plant apricot trees instead of paying fees)/Xinglin district of Xiamen city (renamed Haicang 海沧区 in 2003)

sentences.chinese: 歐洲李和杏的雜交品種。

sentences.english: In order to understand the storage characteristics of apricot fruit sold in strange place.

sentences.english: Yoshino is one of the most famous garden of Japanese apricot in Tokyo.
sentences.chinese: 吉野是日本東京最有名的杏花園之一。

sentences.english: You can also peel peaches, plums and apricots and boil or steam them.
sentences.chinese: 您也可以剝離桃子，李子和杏和煮沸或蒸汽。

sentences.english: The distribution of root systems of two apricot species was observed by the Oskamp method.
sentences.chinese: 用改良壕溝法對兩個杏品種根系分佈進行觀察。

sentences.english: The complete flower of kernel apricot had higher heritability, and the quantity heritability between varieties had very significant difference.
sentences.chinese: 仁用杏有效花的數量遺傳力較高，品種間差異極顯著。

sentences.english: Prunus Armeniaca is widely grown in Fuxin area in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 大扁杏是近年來阜新地區發展迅速的經濟樹種。

sentences.english: The study provide the theoretical base for high yield facility cultivation of Golden sun apricot.
sentences.chinese: 爲金太陽杏高產設施栽培提供理論依據。

sentences.english: Developing plan of planting apricot and suggestion have been put forward.
sentences.chinese: 提出鮮食杏種植的發展規劃和建議。

sentences.english: Kuche apricot meat meat is not only strong, sweet and sour taste, even it is sweet.
sentences.chinese: 庫車杏不僅肉厚味濃，酸甜適口，連杏核也是甜的。

sentences.english: Water insoluble solid (WIS) played a significant role in dried apricot.
sentences.chinese: 水不溶性固形物含量是杏乾製備的一項重要指標。

sentences.english: Apricot processing technology of antibrowning without sulphite was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究杏的無硫護色工藝。

sentences.english: Nanhai apricot blossoms enough ripple, do not fall.
sentences.chinese: 南海漣波潭邊杏，櫻花盡朱落無音。

sentences.english: Maddalena Riesling reveals aromas of apricot, honey, and wildflowers.
sentences.chinese: 瑪塔蓮娜雷司令揭示杏，蜂蜜香味，和野花。

sentences.english: Plums, peaches, pears, and apricots, gently cooked if necessary.
